name: MariaDB
description: MariaDB is an open source relational database management system.

commands.command: IP=$(lxc-info -n {vmId} -iH | head -1) && echo | openssl s_client -starttls mysql -connect $IP:3306 2>&1 | grep -q 'Certificate chain'
commands.description: MariaDB TLS should be available via STARTTLS on port 3306
